main.name: Atul Kumar Awasthi
main.bio: Hi there! I'm Atul! I have 1 yaer of software industry experience and 6 months of frontend development experience. I have made some ineteresting web apps using reactjs. My dream is to be a succesful software developer and influence people's life by making useful apps for them.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Building on the live website, in which adding some features in the live chatbox module, customized responsive UI.Add a feature that improves the SEO performance and user view.Handling server-side rendering (SSR) using express.js. Handle AWS server for deploying code on production and development server.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Built the interactive Dashboard and added some high impact features that improve the efficiency of the application by more than 70%. Responsible for enhancing and maintaining the UI and applications.

work.title: Software Development Intern
work.description: Work with the software development team and developed a Corona-Virus dashboard using Spring boot, REST-API, JSP. Designed project using Spring boot framework and deployed on Apache Tomcat.

projects.title: Airbnb-clone (React JS, Next Js, Server Side Rendering,  Tailwind css)
E-commerce site (React JS, Next Js, Redux, NextAuth, Tailwind css)
Massenger (React JS, Next Js, SSR, Firebase)
Slackon (React JS, Next Js, Styled Components, Firebase-db)

testimonials.text: “Winners never quit, and quitters never win.”
